title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: VR-Based Advanced Study of Human Metabolism

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of biochemistry and cell biology
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the electron transport chain and oxidative phosphorylation processes with over 90% accuracy in a 3D virtual environment
Learners can visually analyze ATP production mechanisms in metabolic processes through VR simulations and explain interactions between key stages
Learners can propose solutions through group discussions after analyzing metabolic disorder cases using VR-based learning tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
